page.title: 12Public Services
page.content: Llandovery is fortunate in having a {Cottage Hospital}with a small accident and emergency unit. Next to it is the{Surgery}(formerly the work house)where clinics are held. The surgery has three doctors. There is also one other doctors' surgery in town. Opposite the Primary School is the {fire station}run by part time officers.Next to it is the{ambulance {station. In the town centre is the{library from where they lend books for the public to read. Every few weeks a{toy mobile library in the form of a caravan goes to the car park where parents and children can borrow toys.
